sourceMeaningMnemonic: A magic <radical>thread</radical> fell from the <radical>roof</radical> onto the <radical>leader</radical> of a <radical>hundred</radical> people, causing him to <kanji>shrink</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Picture one hundred people under the same roof watching in horror as their leader suddenly shrinks to nothingness before them.
readingMnemonic: As the leader <kanji>shrink</kanji>s, the hundred people start screaming and running around the entire place. As a result, everything is <reading>shook</reading> (<ja>しゅく</ja>) up. Especially the poor, shrunken leader, who gets knocked around the most.
readingInfo: The leader gets shook so badly, he can't even call out to his people. They're going to trample his tiny, shrinking body!
